member.name: M:CrudApi.Controllers.NodeController.CreateCube
member.summary: Creates a cube querying SDMX WS and adding corrispondent codes for each attribute or dimension. Adds annotation of type AssociatedCube to the corrispondent DSD.

member.summary: Create file mapping

member.name: M:CrudApi.Controllers.NodeController.CreateDDBDataflow(API.DTO.DFParam)
member.summary: Creates a DDBDataflow: it controls DDBDataflow and SDMX dataflow are not inconsistent and then creates corrispondent artefact in MSDB e DDB. Optionally creates dataflow's categorisations and header. If the dataflow has fewer columns than the original cube a new DSD is also created.
member.param: Object with: ddbDF: Dataflow to be created in DDB. msdbDF: SDMX-JSON containing dataflow to be created in MSDB. msdbCat: SDMX-JSON containing categorisations to be created in MSDB. msdbDF: HeaderTemplate to be created in MSDB.

member.summary: Deletes an SDMX artefact from the MSDB. If the artefact is a DSD, the method deletes it only if it has no AssociatedCube annotations.

The id of the artefact to delete.
The agency of the artefact to delete.
The version of the artefact to delete.

member.name: M:CrudApi.Controllers.NodeController.GetCSVHeader(System.Char,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the header of a CSV file. If the file is not a CSV file or is empty an exception is thrown. If the file has no header, an array of string "Col 1, â€¦, Col N" is returned.
member.param: CSV separator used in the file.
Whether the CSV file has a header or not.
member.returns: A list with the name of the columns to be shown in Mapping.
